bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Lee County was formed in 1792 from Russell County. Part of Scott County was added in 1823.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1804-1831, of Lee County consist of county and commonwealth claims. The majority relate to the payment of witnesses.

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals are located at the Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.
